content: this beautiful long sleeved shrug is crocheted in one piece long sleeves are flared it s nice and warm as you can see in the photos there are many ways this shrug can be worn it can be worn as a shrug scarf and wrap when you want to wear it as a thick warm scarf just fold it in half long ways to wear it as wrap open the center and wrap it around your shoulders you can then tie it in front or wear a broach to hold it together the pattern is available as a free 1 download now when you go to the link it looks like the pattern is not there at first just scroll down and you ll see it if you want the book of 13 patterns you can buy it at places like joann fabrics and lots of places on the web 1 http //www free-crochet com/detail html code=fc01331&cat_id=1
